name: BlitzWolfClean
0:
”Alexa, turn on vacuum”
”Alexa, turn off vacuum”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Link your BlitzWolf Clean account and control your BlitzWolf vacuum cleaner by saying to Alexa.
You can start a clean by just saying: "Alexa, turn on vacuum". You can also stop a clean by just saying: "Alexa, turn off vacuum" and the vacuum will go back to the charge dock.
